title: The Unfiltered Comeback of Oscar De La Hoya
itunes:title: The Unfiltered Comeback of Oscar De La Hoya
description:
After his devastating loss to Manny Pacquiao over a decade ago, Oscar De La Hoya went into a dark depression. Addicted to booze, drugs, and woman, his absence from the ring created a darkness that nearly defeated the all-time great. But Oscar refuses to let his fall from grace define him and he’s planning an epic comeback to the spotlight. In this supremely unfiltered interview, Oscar leaves it all on the canvas and leaves Jeremy nearly speechless. This one is special. 

If you have any questions or comments for JP, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven

IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Oscar De La Hoya's IG: https://www.instagram.com/oscardelahoya
